tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Viraj  is an exceptional professional who knows her job well. She takes care to make the patient feel comfortable and does a thorough professional briefing before and after the procedure. 
The staff too is well trained courteous  the clinic and the equipment is state of art. There is a lot of care taken to maintain vey high standards of hygiene and cleanliness.
Dr Viraj is very  deft and executes her job carefully and flawlessly.
The best part is they she provides a clear and comprehensive treatment  for  problem .
She is an exceptional outright professional.

tags: Wait time,
review: It is rare to find a dentist who is always concerned about the patient and is minimising pain and cost of dental treatment.  A very professional attitude. Hence not just Indian patients but many foreign patients too.  A very neat and hygienic clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Viraj Chopra’s personal care, attention to detail and patient comfort are outstanding.  She is truly the kind of dentist I’ve been looking for and finally found.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I’ve been very happy with the progress I’ve made so that does point to expertise and knowledge that the doctor has and the explanation of each step beforehand that would lead to the progress. I’ve been happy with the thoroughness  shown by the doctor right at the start. I’ve been satisfied by the treatment all through since when I first began it last year, in October. I am told that my braces should come off in another two months. And I will need to wear a plate for a year after that so that there is no relapse in the work undertaken  to improve my bite.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Viraj Chopra has been my dentist for over 7 years now. She is an outstanding professional who uses top grade equipment in a squeaky clean, world-class clinic to compliment her outstanding dentistry skills. I’ve had many emergency situations as well as complex procedures and Dr Viraj Chopra has always fixed them with confidence and care. She invests highly not only in her equipment but also in upgrading her techniques in line with international standards. I have only gratitude and a thumbs up for Dr Chopra’s professionalism. In the current pandemic scenario she has fortified her clinic and trained her staff with the best 
safety procedures. My heartfelt thanks to her and her staff Sunita, Sunil and Sandeep.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind and encouraging words. The VC Smile by Design Team is happy to be of help always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very friendly doctor . I felt v comfortable with her . Her diagnosis r accurate . I m v happy that I went to her . She will try her best to give you d best treatment and make you feel comfortable . Her staff is also too good. You feel special in her clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Made me feel as if we ate family member and thats why explains in detail what she is going to do before doing anything and did everything till she is not. Satisfied no matter how much time it takes. This made me to give my full co-operation during the process and bear whatever little pain i experianced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chopra comes across as a very knowledgeable and sympathetic dentist who took time to explain the problem and systematically took me through the various treatment  options. I was impressed by the clean environment and detail to asepsis. Despite the  state of the art surgery with all modern technology, the pricing was very reasonable. I am very happy to recommend Dr. Chopra

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: It is always a very pleasant experience going to Dr Viraj Chopra for my dental treatment. Her clinic,  VC Smile by Design is benchmarked to international professional and safety standards and is elegant and comfortable too. Most importantly Dr Chopra herself is so thorough in her work, reassuring and has the most gentle touch! I trust her implicitly and strongly recommend her to one and all.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
What a great experience I had. Dr. Viraj Chopra is amazing, kind and caring. She is very comprehensive and professional* ******** ****.
Dr. Chopra is very personable and through in her exam and and clearly explains any issues that may need to be dealt with.  
Very friendly and welcoming staff the moment you walk in. 
Highly recommend.

Dr. Charu Chopra
Ohio, US

review: I had travel lined up and Dr. Viraj Chopra was kind enough to accommodate an appointment on a rather short notice. Her timely & impeccable treatment allowed me to stay pain free during my travels and can’t thank her enough for responding whenever I needed advise. Super professional team, latest & state of the art equipments, most hygienic and one of the safest pair of hands. I am so grateful to you Dr. Viraj. Thanks a million!
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words of appreciation.  They mean a lot us !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As usual Dr. Chopra was very supportive, gentle and professional in her approach. This is much appreciated as going to a dentist is usually worrying  but in her case it is very comfortable. SMYLE by Design Clinics staff are also very helpful and friendly 

Always a good experience 

Sumbul Rizvi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: General aura of Dr. Viraj is very positive and friendly . The way the treatment is discussed with the patient makes you at ease .Most important she can be contacted easily in case of emergency. I was extreamly satisfied with her. I was scared before my root implant started but everything went so smooth

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The clinic is esthetically very pleasing, staff welcoming, the doctor self assured and communicates clearly. What I appreciated especially is that I was not pressured to proceed with a particular mode of treatment, was given options with risk / benefits and could decide on a line I was comfortable with. It was definitely a positive experience.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,

Have already recommended Dr viraj to my friends.

Thank you for your feedback. Glad to know that you found the treatment satisfactory.
At VC Smile by Design our standard of care is at par with international standards both in quality and with regards to hygiene and is delivered by highly experienced professionals. Considering these we believe our charges are appropriate and completely transparent.
